FuncDef: This command specifies at which rate the policer drains packets. The cir value is only supported on dual-bucket-bandwidth policers. If ratemaxis configured, no actual rate limitations are applied.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the rate in Kbps. Values-1 to 100000000, max. ParamDefault: Default- max
Specifies the CIR rate in Kbps. Values-1 to 100000000, max. ParamDefault: Default- max
